thread.title: Nathan Mills
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Nathan Mills

author: Nathan Mills
title: Nathan Mills
text: Bruce was our salesman. He was very informative and helpful in finding what we wanted. Delivery was fast and easy. They had everything set up in about 10 minutes of arriving. There was no damage on anything. We are very satisfied with our purchase and would recommend Gardner White to anyone looking to buy new furniture.
